about_the_game:
Introducing Tamer: King of Dinosaurs An adventure game for people of culture who love dinosaurs, adventure, and beautiful alien women.

Based on the novel series by New York Times Bestseller Michael-Scott Earle, Tamer: King of Dinosaurs blends action, survival, and a story-driven romance unlike any other adult (18+) game currently available. Our proprietary full-body performance capture technology is brought to life by a talented cast of professional actors, so every romance scene, every conflict, and every triumph is rooted in the context of our story.

Compelling Story


Play as Victor Shelby, a Los Angeles animal control officer who gets abducted by aliens and set on a dangerous dinosaur planet. Victor soon encounters beautiful alien women who need his help to survive. You'll have to provide food and water to the women each day, protect them from the terrors of this world, and build a fort to ensure their future safety. Accomplishing these tasks will earn their love and respect, eventually culminating in fully explicit romance scenes. With over 7 hours of dialogue and performance capture animation done by a cast of outstanding actors, Tamer: King of Dinosaurs will deliver a compelling story you will love.

Core Gameplay


Tamer: King of Dinosaurs is a one-time purchase, single player, survival, action, fort building, harem dating sim experience. The end goal of the game is to build a fort that keeps the "Tribe" of Victor and his four love interests safe from the dinosaurs of the planet. You will need to finish daily quests to solve the problems facing your tribe, including fighting vicious dinosaurs, hunting and gathering, crafting and construction, and also romantic expeditions that give your lovers what they need to thrive on a deadly alien world.

Romance


Four unique women await you in Tamer: King of Dinosaurs. Each woman brings a different personality and speciality that can assist you.

Sheela, the Huntress.

This stoic cat-like woman is skilled in combat and understands the dangers of this world. She’ll join you on most of your quests, help you build weapons, and provide you with combat training.

Galmine, the Gardener.

This beautiful woman has the sweetest personality you could imagine, and she loves to grow her vegetables and herbs. She’ll offer uplifting advice and provide you with recipes for food, poisons, and anything else plant related.

Trel-Idil-Iria, Duchess of Family Iria, the Builder.

Trel is the most important, intelligent, and beautiful person in her world, and she’ll remind you of this every chance she gets. Despite her haughty personality, she really is a genius. Once you win her over, she’ll help you craft tools and build the fort.

Kacerie, the Stylist.

Pink haired and sassy, Kacerie comes from a world with slightly more advanced technology than our Earth. She doesn’t want to be on this planet, but that’s understandable. Once she forms a strong relationship with you, she’ll be able to help you with all the cosmetic nuances of women’s outfits and the new fort.

Once you’ve earned enough respect with each woman, you will be able to make love to them. During the sex modules, you’ll have complete control of the position, camera angle, lighting, and pace. Since Tamer: King of Dinosaurs is a harem game, you won’t have to worry about picking just one love interest. All four women will fall in love with you as long as you complete the dating sim respect quests, and they do not have a problem sharing you with the others.

Development

We are on track for a launch in 2025. Check out our website for more updates and don’t forget to Wishlist!

content_descriptors.notes:
Tamer: King of Dinosaurs is a dinosaur themed adventure game with fort and relationship building. During the course of the game, the player will be able to romance four unique alien women.
- Dialogue around love, sex, and procreating that may not be suitable for those under the age of 18.
- Clothed kissing and hugging.
- Skimpy and revealing outfits.
- Consensual and explicit sex scenes where the player can control the pace, position, outfits, lighting, and camera angle.

legal_notice: TAMER KING OF DINOSAURS is a trademark authorized for use by Ride the Lion Studios. © 2024 Ride the Lion Studios. All rights are reserved.
name: Tamer: King of Dinosaurs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10, Windows11 (64bit)
  • Processor: AMD FX-6300, Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050ti, Radeon RX 560X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10, Windows11 (64bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600G, Intel Core i7-13700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 3070, Radeon RX 5700XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: A survival/action/dating sim with an interactive world based on the best selling harem novel series by Michael-Scott Earle. Fight, hunt, and tame dinosaurs, craft weapons and tools, build a fort to protect the alien women you love, and experience a romance story like no other.
